name: Dry Contacts
description: The adeunis DRY CONTACTS is a ready-to-use radio transmitter enabling the user on one hand to transfer statuses and alarms on a LoRa network and on the other to control relays via the same network. This product meets the needs of users who require to remotely monitor (or control) simple on-off digital data: detection of door opening, presence, machine starting, warning, etc
author: Akenza AG
